snippet: It is necessary to look for ways to raise the pressure on President Bashar al-Assad and encourage a stable postwar Syria without arming the rebels.
abstract: Editorial commends the Obama administration for resisting calls to arm Syrian rebels;  holds the United States must find other ways to raise pressure on Pres Bashar al-Assad and encourage post-war stability.
lead_paragraph: It is necessary to look for ways to raise the pressure on President Bashar al-Assad and encourage a stable postwar Syria without arming the rebels.
